data.description: Welcome to 35 Cortland Way, a modern 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom home built in 2012. The open floor plan seamlessly connects the living, dining, and kitchen areas giving the home a flowing and comfortable feel. The kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances, a large island with breakfast bar, and plenty of cabinet space. The primary suite offers an ample sized closet and primary bathroom featuring a walk-in shower. Two additional bedrooms, one and a half bathrooms, and a large lower level family room provide plenty of additional living space. Lastly, the two-car garage offers enough room for vehicles and storage. This home is located just minutes from beautiful downtown Southington and ESPN headquarters. Hartford is just a short 25-minute drive away, allowing you to enjoy all the city has to offer. Moreover, its prime location near I-84 ensures easy access to major routes, making commuting a breeze.
